message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15000 to you. I am confident it will significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional value, I propose to sell it to you for $12000. This offer represents a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive price. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.
